snippet: The results of Sunday’s vote will bring either a continuation of decades of leadership by the current government or the nation’s first handover of power.
abstract: Malaysians head to polls to decide what appears to be most closely contested election in country's history; results will bring either continuation of decades of leadership by current power or nation's first handover of power.
lead_paragraph: The results of Sunday’s vote will bring either a continuation of decades of leadership by the current government or the nation’s first handover of power.

headline.seo: Opposition in Tight Race to Take Power in Malaysian Election
headline.main: Opposition in Tight Race to Take Power in Malaysian Election
headline.print_headline: Opposition in a Tight Race to Take Power in Malaysia
